statements.select: select count(*) from ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# and polluteProName=#PolluteSourcePro# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProType# and bePollutedProName=#BePollutedPro# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#
statements.update: update ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb set ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# , PolluteProName=#PolluteProName#, PolluteProType=#PolluteProType#, BePollutedProName=#BePollutedProName#, BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#, CleaningLiquidName=#CleaningLiquidName#, CleaningLiquidUseVol=#CleaningLiquidUseVol#, CleanTimes=#CleanTimes# where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedleOld# and PolluteProName=#PolluteProNameOld# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProTypeOld# and BePollutedProName=#BePollutedProNameOld# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProTypeOld#
statements.delete: delete from ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# and PolluteProName=#PolluteProName# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProType# and BePollutedProName=#BePollutedProName# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#
statements.select: select ReagentName from reagentsettingstb where ReagentType='清洗剂'
